channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 00:20 Air alert in Kharkiv region. Follow further messages.
item.description: 🔴 00:20 Air alert in Kharkiv region. Follow further messages. #Kharkiv_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟢 00:17 An alarm has been sounded in Donetsk region. Stay tuned for further messages.

item.title: 🟡 00:17 Alarm lifted in Kharkiv region. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in:- Kupyansky district- Kharkiv district- Lipetsk territorial community- Vovchansk territorial community

item.title: 🔴 22:01 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community there is artillery shelling. Go to shelter!
item.description: 🔴 22:01 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community there is artillery shelling.
